name: exogui
description: A desktop application used to browse, manage and play games from eXoDOS collection. Based on BlueMaxima's Flashpoint launcher.

scripts.pack:linux: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=linux PACK_ARCH=x64 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:win32: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=win32 PACK_ARCH=ia32 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:darwin: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=darwin PACK_ARCH=x64 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:m1: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=darwin PACK_ARCH=arm64 npx gulp pack
scripts.pack:all: npx cross-env PACK_PLATFORM=all PACK_ARCH=all npx gulp pack
scripts.release: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack"
scripts.release:linux: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:linux"
scripts.release:win32: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:win32"
scripts.release:darwin: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:darwin"
scripts.release:m1: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:m1"
scripts.release:all: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production "npm run build && npm run pack:all"
scripts.publish: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production PUBLISH=true "npm run build && npm run pack"
scripts.publish:linux: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production PUBLISH=true "npm run build && npm run pack:linux"
scripts.publish:win32: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production PUBLISH=true "npm run build && npm run pack:win32"
scripts.publish:darwin: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production PUBLISH=true "npm run build && npm run pack:darwin"
scripts.publish:m1: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production PUBLISH=true "npm run build && npm run pack:m1"
scripts.publish:all: npx cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production PUBLISH=true "npm run build && npm run pack:all"

author: mgo
